name: Dach Coin
description:
Started in Q3 of 2018, Dach Coin's mission is to bring (new) investors and cryptocurrency projects together and stimulate mass adoption in the crypto sphere. 
Dach Coin is building an ecosystem around the DACHX currency. Users are able to generate DACHX through the process of Proof-of-Stake and masternodes. 

DACHX will be the main payment option in the following use cases:

- Dachcoin.live provides information (e.g. charts, news, ICOs) on cryptocurrency projects. 
- Dach.exchange was released in Q1 2019
- DACHZONE, a digital marketplace, will be released in Q3 of 2019. 
- DACHTRUST, a trustplatform where new projects will be rated, will be released in Q4 of 2019. 

More information can be found at https://www.dachcoin.live/ or on all social media outlets.
